content: पात {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} Protected, guarded &c.; See पा.

पातः [पत्-घञ्] {@--1@} Flying, flight. {@--2@} Alighting, descending, descent. {@--3@} Falling down, fall, downfall (fig also); द्रुम°, गृह°; चग्णपातः ‘falling down at the feet’; <ls>R. 11. 92</ls>; पातोत्पातौ ‘rise and fall.’ {@--4@} Destruction. dissolution, ruin; <ls>Ku. 3. 44.</ls> {@--5@} A blow, stroke; as in खड्गपातः. {@--6@} Shedding, discharging, emitting; असृक्पातैः <ls>Ms. 8. 44.</ls> {@--7@} A cast, throw, shot; दृष्टि° <ls>R. 13. 18.</ls> {@--8@} An attack, inroad. {@--9@} Happening, coming to pass, occurrence. {@--10@} A failing, defect. {@--11@} An epithet of Rāhu. {@--12@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) An inauspicious or malignant position or aspect. {@--13@} The node in a planet's orbit.
